text: eghtɨ nɨ men damaziba kuightɨma, me akɨrim ragh mɨtatemɨn arazir kurabagh asaraghɨva, angazangarimɨn izɨ. Egh me Satanɨn atrivir gavgavim ateghɨva, God bagh izɨ. Kamaghɨn kɨ men arazir kuraba gɨn amangam, eghtɨ me nɨghnɨzir gavgavim nan itir gumazamizibar tongɨn danganim iniam. Nan gumazamizir kaba, me nɨghnɨzir gavgavim nan itima, kɨ me gamizɨ me zue. Nɨ ingangarir kam damusɨ, kɨ me bagha nɨ amadi.’”
